Class ProcessResults

java.lang.Object
ProcessResults
public class ProcessResults extends Object
ProcessResults is used in election processing to write election results and proceedings to an audit file.
Author:
everyone

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private File
    auditFile
    File type, holds the file being used for the audit during the duration of election processing.

    • auditFile

      private File auditFile
      File type, holds the file being used for the audit during the duration of election processing.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProcessResults

      public ProcessResults(String electionType) throws IOException
      Creates an audit file for election results and proceedings.
      Parameters:
      electionType - String contained IR or CPL
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs when creating the audit file.

  • Method Details

    • addVotingType

      public void addVotingType(String type) throws IOException
      Writes the type of election to the audit file.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the election, IR or CPL, as a String.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs when writing to audit file.

    • addCandidateAmount

      void addCandidateAmount(String num) throws IOException
      Writes the number of candidates to the audit file.
      Parameters:
      num - the number of candidates in the election as a String.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the audit file cannot be written into

    • addCandidate

      void addCandidate(String name, String party, int initialBallots) throws IOException
      Writes a candidate to the audit file. Adds candidate name, political party, and initial number of ballots they received.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the candidate as a String.
      party - the name of the candidate's political party as a String.
      initialBallots - the number of initial ballots the candidate received as an int.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs when writing to the audit file.

    • addLoser

      void addLoser(String name, int finalBallotCount) throws IOException
      Writes a candidate who was eliminated from the election to the audit file. Adds the candidate's name and their final ballot count before elimination.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the eliminated candidate as a String.
      finalBallotCount - the candidate's final ballot count as an int.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs when writing to the audit file.

    • removedBallot

      void removedBallot(int index) throws IOException
      Writes that a ballot was removed if all its candidates were eliminated to the audit file. Writes the unique ballot index to the file for identification.
      Parameters:
      index - the ballot index of the removed ballot as an int.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs when writing to the audit file.

    • addWinner

      void addWinner(String name, int finalBallotCount) throws IOException
      Writes the winner of the election to the audit file. Writes the winner's name and the final number of ballots they received.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the winner as a String.
      finalBallotCount - the winner's final number of ballots as an int.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs when writing to the audit file.

    • addParty

      void addParty(String party, ArrayList candidates, int partyBallots) throws IOException
      Writes the Parties in the running for CPL Election.
      Parameters:
      party - Name of the parties in CPL election.
      candidates - String of Candidates for said party.
      partyBallots - number of ballots in a party.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws IOException with null as its error detail message.

    • addSeatWinner

      void addSeatWinner(String party, String candidate, int partyBallots) throws IOException
      Writes Party Winner and the candidate to the audit file.
      Parameters:
      party - Names of the party
      candidate - Name of the candidate that won the seat.
      partyBallots - The number of ballots voted to respective party.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws IOException with null as its error detail message.

    • addSeat

      void addSeat(int seatNums, String party, int partyBallots, int quota) throws IOException
      Writes the allocation of seats for a CPL election.
      Parameters:
      seatNums - Number of seats being allocated.
      party - Party recieving allocated seats.
      partyBallots - Number of ballots for respective party.
      quota - The quota used to determine remainder winner.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException Throws IOException with null as its error detail message.

    • addTie

      void addTie(String tiedParties, String chosenWinner) throws IOException
      Writes that a TIE occurs in CPL election. Shows list of tied parties and chosen winner at random.
      Parameters:
      tiedParties - arrayList of ties parties.
      chosenWinner - The winner that was chosen at random.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException Throws IOException with null as its error detail message.

    • addRemainder

      void addRemainder(String party) throws IOException
      Writes to the audit winner of remaining seats.
      Parameters:
      party - This is the party that won the remainder.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException Throws IOException with null as its error detail message.
